content.en: Optimizing PEMFCs: Researchers have explored the use of various algorithms, such as the Whale Optimization Algorithm, Improved Fluid Search Optimization Algorithm, and Harris Hawks Optimization Algorithm, to obtain accurate parameters for Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells (PEMFCs). These algorithms are being used to estimate unknown parameters, select optimal parameters, and extract parameters for PEMFC models. Other algorithms, like the Artificial Gorilla Troops Optimizer and Hunger Games Search Algorithm, are also being investigated for their potential in optimizing the values and modeling of PEMFCs.
content.da: Optimering af PEMFC'er: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom Whale Optimization Algorithm, Improved Fluid Search Optimization Algorithm og Harris Hawks Optimization Algorithm, for at opnå nøjagtige parametre for Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells (PEMFC'er). Disse algoritmer bruges til at estimere ukendte parametre, vælge optimale parametre og udtrække parametre til PEMFC-modeller. Andre algoritmer, som Artificial Gorilla Troops Optimizer og Hunger Games Search Algorithm, undersøges også for deres potentiale i at optimere værdierne og modelleringen af PEMFC'er.
